title.rendered: Betty Mutwiri of BM Leadership Coaching & Consulting Inc. to be Featured on Close Up Radio

content.rendered:
SASKATOON, SASKATCHEWAN, CANADA, July 12, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Good Leaders are the bedrock of all nations, businesses, and communities. In today’s complex and dynamic business climate, the importance of good leaders has become even more critical. But how can leaders navigate these challenges and can become more agile and inclusive? One of the most optimal ways is by working with an experienced professional coach who can partner with them and help them activate the clarity, confidence and wisdom to thrive especially in these turbulent times.

Betty Mutwiri is a seasoned executive and leadership coach, consultant, author, and international conference speaker. She empowers individuals in executive and leadership roles to navigate the fast-paced business landscape. With her extensive experience and deep understanding of the evolving business environment, Betty emphasizes agile leadership grounded in authenticity, empathy, and wisdom. Betty is the Founder and CEO of BM Leadership Coaching & Consulting Inc., where she partners with leaders and leadership teams to provide coaching and consulting services in areas such coach training, leadership development, change management, and Equity. Diversity and Inclusion (EDI). Betty’s approach fosters innovative insights and drives aligned influence, empowering leaders to reach new heights of leadership impact.

Betty’s unique combination of firsthand experience as a senior leader for two decades, solid educational background, and various certifications sets her apart. Holding a Graduate Certificate in Executive Coaching, a Professional Certified Coach (PCC) from the International Coaching Federation (ICF), and a Master of Arts Degree in Leadership and Training from Royal Roads University, Betty is well-equipped with the latest knowledge and expertise in leadership development. Her certifications in Emotional Intelligence, Cultural Intelligence, and Change Management further enhance her ability to provide comprehensive and tailored coaching approaches.

It was over twenty-five years ago; Betty took part in a leadership development program that was an absolute eye opener for her. It dawned on her how that authentic transformational leadership had a direct impact on the organization’s triple bottom line. Not only that, young Betty had the good fortune of having parents who were visionary and altruistic and she grew up knowing in her heart that empathetic people are an asset to our world.

As the Lead Author of the book “Courage, Change & Faith: Inspiring Narratives of Black Women Leaders,” Betty shares her story entitled “Purpose, Potential & Power” which serves as the foundation for Betty’s keynotes, workshops, and coaching sessions. She leverages her experiences to unlock leadership potential and drive meaningful change.

Betty has received numerous accolades, including being named one of Canada’s Top 100 Black Women to Watch in 2022, the Queen Elizabeth II Platinum Jubilee Award in 2022, and being a nominee for the RBC Woman of Influence 2023. Additionally, she was recognized as a 2022-2023 Diversity Champion by the Women In Leadership Foundation (WIL).

Central to Betty’s coaching philosophy is the power of mental fitness. She emphasizes that mindset is the foundation for personal and professional growth. By nurturing mental, spiritual, and emotional intelligence, leaders can continuously expand their capabilities and tap into their unlimited potential. Betty’s coaching techniques, supported by unique tools and strategies, empower clients to become their best selves and make a significant impact in their spheres of influence.

“I help my clients to grow into the highest version of themselves and thrive in an uncertain and complex world; Lead Boldly, Live Fully and Leave a Legacy. Isn’t that what we all aspire to be and to do?”

Close Up Radio will feature Betty Mutwiri in an interview with Jim Masters on Thursday July 13th at 1pm EST

Listen to the show on BlogTalkRadio

If you have any questions for our guest, please call (347) 996-3389

For more information, visit www.bmcoachingconsulting.ca

Written By: Beatrice Maria Centeno

Lou Ceparano
Close Up Television & Radio
+1 631-850-3314
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook

You just read:

News Provided By

July 12, 2023, 13:00 GMT
